casebody.data:
BEARD v. OHIO. No. 2,

Misc.

Decided October 12, 1959. Petitioner pro se.. Mark McElroy, Attorney General of Ohio, and William M. Vance, Assistant Attorney General, for respondent. Per Curiam.

The motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and the petition for writ of certiorari are granted. The judgment is reversed. Burns v. Ohio, 360 U. S. 252.

Mr. Justice Stewart took no part in the consideration or decision of this case. .
